title: Polaroid
description: High school loner Bird Fitcher has no idea what dark secrets are tied to the mysterious Polaroid vintage camera she stumbles upon, but it doesn't take long to discover that those who have their picture taken meet a tragic end. Bird and her friends must survive one more night as they race to solve the mystery of the haunted Polaroid before it kills them all.

reviews.text: Mala, pero no pésima, la historia es aburrida, formulaica, cliché y predecible, los personajes son simplemente genéricos.
What an absolute boring piece of **** to a movie. Who the hell looked at this and said "good job" ?

This movie is terrible. Not only living off jump scares but having an extremely boring story. I couldn't even get through the first half hour of it, it is terrible. The only scary thing in the end is how much time you wasted watching it when you could've watched something way better.
Camera takes pictures but then, the subjects are killed by the original camera owner's dad, who just seems to enjoy killing.
